ygData.subject: Re: The Fiery Avenger
ygData.msgSnippet: The Fiery Avenger is a Holy Weapon along with the Ghoulbane... until it is discovered by fact in the game, that s what I ll believe.  My paladin used two
ygData.messageBody:
The Fiery Avenger is a Holy Weapon along with the Ghoulbane... until it is discovered by fact in the game, that's what I'll believe. My paladin used two handed anyway, so they still do 'wield two handed swords.'
-----Original Message-----
From: Michael Wooldirdge <mike@...>
To: EQCheats@onelist.com <EQCheats@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, June 29, 1999 12:54 PM
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] The Fiery Avenger


I don't know where you guys are hearing this but the Fiery Avenger is not paladin only. First off the Fiery Avenger is two handed and Paladin's wield one handed swords. Orginally it was supposed to be Paladin only but in beta Paladin's moved frorm using two handed swords as their holy swords to one handed. Also Shadow Knights big weapon is the Dark Reaver 20 dmg 42 dly and casts some spell. The warriors big weapon is the Executioner's Axe 25dmg 50dly both the Dark Reaver and Axe are in Lower Guk.
